page.title: 13MY NEIGHBOURHOOD.
page.content:
My area of Stockton is right in the town centre and there are no houses only shops. It smells a bit when 'punks' drop smelling bombs. There are no parks only a churchyard where I take my dog Sabra for a walk. I am lucky sometimes when I see a wedding taking place, but sometimes I just see drunken people. At night the noise is deafening as I live in a pub. {Jennifer Wilkinson (12)
I live at 18 Dunelm Road, Stockton. Just round the back of my house is Whitehouse Primary School. The houses in the area have all been designed by the owners. We have lived here for a year and the house next door is for sale. {Rachel Babur (12)
